section.title: Insecure Cipher RC4 is enabled on version 1.2.x (CC-3125)
section.p:
The encryption used for HTTPS is configurable. If you do not want to use Cipher RC4, you can change the configuration and remove it as an option. Perform the following:
Open /etc/default/serviced with a text editor.
Locate SERVICED_TLS_CIPHERS.
Remove TLS_RSA_WITH_RC4_128_SHA from the list of ciphers.
Save and close the file.
